jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Responsible for server-side web application logic and integration of the work front-end developers do. Working with databases, message queues, and other server-side technologies.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Developing new user-facing features, determining the structure and design of web pages, building reusable codes, and optimizing page loading times.

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Creating user-centered designs by understanding business requirements, and user feedback. Designing UI elements like input controls, navigational components, and informational components.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Implement integrations requested by customers. Deploy updates and fixes. Provide Level 2 technical support. Build tools to reduce occurrences of errors and improve customer experience.

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: Responsible for planning, overseeing and leading projects from ideation through to completion. Requires interaction with a range of internal and external stakeholders.

jobs.title: Data Scientist Internship
jobs.description: An internship opportunity for a budding data scientist to work on real-world problems, including data collection, cleaning, modeling, and visualization.

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer (Flutter)
jobs.description: Design and build sophisticated and highly scalable apps using Flutter. Translate and build the designs and Wireframes into high-quality responsive UI code.

jobs.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
jobs.description: Reviewing quality specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback. Creating detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases.

jobs.title: IT Support Specialist
jobs.description: Provide technical assistance with computer hardware and software. Resolve issues for users in person, on the phone, or electronically. Log and track support tickets.

jobs.title: System Administrator
jobs.description: Responsible for the maintenance, configuration, and reliable operation of computer systems and servers. Installing hardware and software and participating in research and development.

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Develop strategies and tactics to get the word out about our company and drive qualified traffic to our front door. Deploy successful marketing campaigns and own their implementation from ideation to execution.

jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.description: A creative individual who can produce stunning visuals for our brand. You will be responsible for creating designs for marketing materials, social media, and our website.

jobs.title: Business Analyst
jobs.description: The vital link between our information technology capacity and our business objectives by supporting and ensuring the successful completion of analytical, building, testing and deployment tasks of our software productâ€™s features.

jobs.title: Human Resources Specialist
jobs.description: Handle the daily administrative and HR duties of an organization. You will assist HR managers with recruitment, record maintenance, and payroll processing.

jobs.title: Customer Support Representative
jobs.description: Be the first point of contact for our customers. You will be responsible for answering customer queries, resolving issues, and providing excellent customer service.
